description.@en: Baking a tasty pie or something else using ingredients from your ‘six-demon bag’, it immediately satiates your friend’s hunger and thirst.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, select a number of allies equal to your [WB]. They need not eat or drink for the Duration. At the end of the Duration, all those who ate the stomach suffer 6 Corruption.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but triple the number of allies affected.

criticalFailure.@en: The stomachs of all those who ate the Reagents grow sour! They must Resist with a successful Toughness Test or else contract Bloody Flux.

reagents.@en: Powdered granite and a stomach from your own Ancestry, eaten by others (expended)
